name: Gin Botanical
description: Fermented with spent gin botanicals from Batch 206 Distillery, our Gin Botanical is a semi-dry cider showcasing lemon, orange rind, juniper, cucumber and verbena. Like the spirit that inspired it, this cider is complex, clean, aromatic and refreshing.
foodPairings: Herbed Chicken, Fresh Melon, pickled ginger.
